author: Gabby Orr and Melanie Zanona
title: Trump may offer help to Katie Britt in Alabama Senate primary -- even though he's already endorsed Mo Brooks

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, the celebrity doctor running for the Republican nomination in Pennsylvania’s 2022 Senate race, claims he is “100% pro-life” but has a record indicating otherwise.
author: Breccan F. Thies
title: Dr. Oz’s Pro-Life Campaign Branding at Odds with Past Comments

sentence: Donald Trump’s recent endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania Republican Senate primary shook MAGA world to its core.
author: Rick Moran
title: The Silly Talk of Trump's Demise Over Oz Endorsement
